entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:17 p.m. EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.4Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 7:00 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
Temperature: 5.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: 4.0°C
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: A few showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning early in the morning. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h in the morning then southwest 20 in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late in the evening and overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
